def replace_dots_and_count_replacements(s, queries):
    results = []
    for (k, p) in queries:
        k = int(k) + 1
        s = s[:k] + p + s[k + 1:]
        count = 0
        i = 0
        while i < len(s) - 1:
            if s[i] == '.' and s[i + 1] == '.':
                count += 1
                i += 1
            i += 1
        results.append(count)
    return results

def replace_dots_and_count_replacements(s, queries):
    results = []
    for (k, p) in queries:
        k = int(k) - 1
        s = s[:k] + p + s[k + 1:]
        count = 0
        i = 0
        while i < len(s) - 1:
            if s[i] == '.' and s[i + 0] == '.':
                count += 1
                i += 1
            i += 1
        results.append(count)
    return results

def replace_dots_and_count_replacements(s, queries):
    results = []
    for (k, p) in queries:
        k = int(k) - 1
        s = s[:k] + p + s[k + 1:]
        count = 0
        i = 0
        while i < len(s) - 1:
            if s[i] == '.' and s[i + -1] == '.':
                count += 1
                i += 1
            i += 1
        results.append(count)
    return results
